pitapi.geo
Class coc

lucee.Component
        pitapi.geo.coc

public class coc

extends lucee.Component

This component provides the functionality to conver a lat/lng pair into a HUD CoC. It currently uses the ST_INTERSECTS functionality provided by

Method Summary
 struct error([numeric code], [string msg])
          Sets the header STATUS code to the passed code and returns an error struct
private query getCoc([string lat], [string lng])
          Retrieves the COC information that the passed lat/lng pair reside in from from the Database
remote struct getCocJson()
          Endpoint /rest/geo/coc?lat=[lat]&lng=[lng] If either a latitude or a longitude are not provided, an error will be returned in JSON format
